description: Series(W(exp(1)*(1+x)), x) = sum( a[ n ]/(2^(2*n)*n!), n=0..infinity), where W is the Lambert W function.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..150
formula: E.g.f.: LambertW(exp(1)*(1+4*x)). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Nov 19 2003|a(n)| ~ 4^n * exp(n) * n^(n-1) / (1+exp(2))^(n-1/2). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jul 09 2013
maple: LambertW( exp(1)*(1+x) );seq(n!*coeff(series(LambertW(exp(1)*(1+4*x)), x, n+1), x, n), n=0..20); # _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jul 09 2013
mathematica: max = 17; (Series[ ProductLog[E*(1 + 4*x)], {x, 0, max}] // CoefficientList[#, x] &)*Range[0, max]! (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jun 20 2013 *)
author: rmc(AT)pineapple.apmaths.uwo.ca (Robert Corless)
extensions: More terms from _N. J. A. Sloane_.
